name: go-plus
description: Makes working with Go in Atom awesome.
author: Joe Fitzgerald <jfitzgerald@pivotal.io> (http://github.com/joefitzgerald)

panelDisplayMode.title: Panel Display Mode
panelDisplayMode.description: Control the behavior of the go-plus panel when a new Atom window is opened

panelOrientation.title: Panel Orientation
panelOrientation.description: Dock the panel to the bottom or right of the window

maxPanelHeight.title: Maximum Panel Height
maxPanelHeight.description: When the panel orientation is horizontal, prevent the panel from occupying the entire window

minPanelHeight.title: Minimum Panel Height
minPanelHeight.description: When the panel orientation is horizontal, ensure the panel doesn't disappear when open

currentPanelHeight.title: Current Panel Height
currentPanelHeight.description: When the panel orientation is horizontal, the height of the panel (this is changed when you drag the panel to resize it, so the setting is preserved)

maxPanelWidth.title: Maximum Panel Width
maxPanelWidth.description: When the panel orientation is vertical, prevent the panel from occupying the entire window

minPanelHeight.title: Minimum Panel Width
minPanelHeight.description: When the panel orientation is vertical, ensure the panel doesn't disappear when open

currentPanelWidth.title: Current Panel Width
currentPanelWidth.description: When the panel orientation is vertical, the width of the panel (this is changed when you drag the panel to resize it, so the setting is preserved)

gopath.title: GOPATH
gopath.description: (Not Recommended For Use) If you have issues setting your GOPATH in your environment, you can use this to establish a fallback value. See https://github.com/joefitzgerald/go-config/wiki/GOPATH for more information.

scopeBlacklist.title: Scope Blacklist
scopeBlacklist.description: Suggestions will not be shown when the cursor is inside the following comma-delimited scope(s).

suppressBuiltinAutocompleteProvider.title: Suppress The Provider Built-In To autocomplete-plus
suppressBuiltinAutocompleteProvider.description: Suppress the provider built-in to the autocomplete-plus package when editing .go files.

suppressActivationForCharacters.title: Suppress Activation For Characters
suppressActivationForCharacters.description: Suggestions will not be provided when you type one of these characters.

snippetMode.title: Snippet Mode
snippetMode.description: When inserting suggestions for funcs, generate a snippet that includes parenthesis only (none), argument name (name), or argument name and type (nameAndType).

proposeBuiltins.title: Propose Builtins
proposeBuiltins.description: Add built-in types, functions and constants to an autocompletion proposals. Default: true.

unimportedPackages.title: Unimported Packages
unimportedPackages.description: Provide suggestions for unimported packages. Default: true.

formatOnSave.title: Run Format Tool On Save
formatOnSave.description: Run the configured format tool each time a file is saved

tool.title: Format Tool
tool.description: Choose one: goimports, goreturns, or gofmt

runTestsOnSave.title: Run Tests On Save
runTestsOnSave.description: Run `go test -coverprofile` each time a file is saved

runTestsWithShortFlag.title: Run Tests With Short Flag Set

runTestsWithVerboseFlag.title: Run Tests With Verbose Flag Set

coverageHighlightMode.title: Coverage Highlight Mode
coverageHighlightMode.description: Control the way that coverage highlighting occurs

focusPanelIfTestsFail.title: Focus The go-plus Panel If Tests Fail
focusPanelIfTestsFail.description: If the panel is hidden, or the panel is showing a different tab, the panel will be expanded and the test tab focused when tests fail.
